thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 4 of 625
thread.title: Gali

author: Gali
title: Gali
text:
I really love Korean make-up, but because of where I live, I can't just go to the store and simply buy something like that. YesStyle provides us with great products for low prices!
The site was recommended by a friend of my, and I've been shopping there for my make-up ever since.
Even though the order takes a while, it's always neatly packed, and no damage what so ever. In my opinion, this kind of service is hard to find these days. Especially where I live.
I could recommend buying at YesStyle to everyone!!
